          пассивный залог (Passive Voice)
        Повелительное (the Imperative Mood) - приказы, побуждения.

        Conditional Tenses: выражение гипотетических ситуаций.⠉
          conditionals:
            0 - реальное общеизвестное: if-present/present
            1 - реальное частное: if-present/future
            2 - гипотетическое будущее: if-past/subjective
            3 - гипотетическое прошлое: if-past-perfect/future-in-the-past
            4 - mix: all posible variations
            замены для if:
              1 - when/unless/even if/provided that/should/otherwise/etc..
              2 - would/where i to/if i were to/if it weren't for/etc..
              3 - would have/had i/if it hadn't been for/had it not been for/etc..

          Future Simple in the Past: I would eat.
          Future Continuous in the Past: I would be eating.
          Future Perfect in the Past: I would have eaten.
          Future Perfect Continuous in the Past: I would have been eating.
